definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: I read newspaper, is wearing a Presbyopia mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我看书报时，是戴了老花眼镜。

sentences.english: Can someone with presbyopia get LASIK eye surgery?
sentences.chinese: 关于老花眼能不能做Lasik手术的问题。

sentences.english: It is said to combat presbyopia, or age-related long-sightedness.
sentences.chinese: 据说它能对抗老花眼或和年龄有关的远视。

sentences.english: I read newspaper, is wearing Presbyopia the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我看书报时，是戴了老花眼镜。

definition: eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
overlapping images/double exposure of photo (e.g. due to fault or motion of camera)/double vision
